mapper.select: SELECT hmc.company_id, hmc.employee_id, hmc.hf_type, SUM(hmc.amount) amount, SUM(hmc.com_amount) com_amount, SUM(hmc.emp_amount) emp_amount, CASE WHEN hmc.hf_type = 1 THEN tmp.base ELSE tmp2.base END base, CASE WHEN hmc.hf_type = 1 THEN tmp.ratio ELSE tmp2.ratio END ratio, CASE WHEN hmc.hf_type = 1 THEN tmp.ratio_com ELSE tmp2.ratio_com END ratio_com, CASE WHEN hmc.hf_type = 1 THEN tmp.ratio_emp ELSE tmp2.ratio_emp END ratio_emp FROM hf_month_charge hmc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT hmc.emp_archive_id, hmc.hf_type, hmc.base, hmc.ratio*100 ratio, hmc.ratio_com*100 ratio_com, hmc.ratio_emp*100 ratio_emp FROM hf_month_charge hmc WHERE hmc.is_active = 1 AND hmc.company_id = #{companyId} AND hmc.employee_id = #{employeeId} AND hmc.hf_month = #{hfMonth} AND hmc.hf_type = 1 ORDER BY hmc.ss_month_belong DESC LIMIT 1 ) tmp ON hmc.emp_archive_id = tmp.emp_archive_id AND hmc.hf_type = tmp.hf_type LEFT JOIN ( SELECT hmc.emp_archive_id, hmc.hf_type, hmc.hf_month, hmc.base, hmc.ratio*100 ratio, hmc.ratio_com*100 ratio_com, hmc.ratio_emp*100 ratio_emp FROM hf_month_charge hmc WHERE hmc.is_active = 1 AND hmc.company_id = #{companyId} AND hmc.employee_id = #{employeeId} AND hmc.hf_month = #{hfMonth} AND hmc.hf_type = 2 ORDER BY hmc.ss_month_belong DESC LIMIT 1 ) tmp2 ON hmc.emp_archive_id = tmp2.emp_archive_id AND hmc.hf_type = tmp2.hf_type WHERE hmc.is_active = 1 AND hmc.company_id = #{companyId} AND hmc.employee_id = #{employeeId} AND hmc.hf_month = #{hfMonth} GROUP BY hmc.company_id, hmc.employee_id, hmc.hf_month, hmc.hf_type
